text: Kalanidhi or Kalanithi may refer to: *Kalanidhi Indira Sangeet Mahavidyalaya, a Nepal classical music school *Sangeetha Kalanidhi, an award given by the by the Madras Music Academy ==People with the surname== *A. Kalanithi, Indian politician *Kalanithi Maran, Indian media baron *Kalanidhi Narayanan, Indian dancer *Kalanidhi Veeraswamy, Indian politician *Manju Latha Kalanidhi, Indian journalist *Paul Kalanithi, Indian-American neurosurgeon Category:Indian masculine given names
title: Kalanidhi
